greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A266114 (numbers that are least siblings in A263267-tree).
comment: a(n) = 1 if there doesn't exist any k < n such that k - tau(k) = n - tau(n), and 0 otherwise. Here tau(n) = A000005(n), the number of divisors of n.
Also the characteristic function for the range of A082284 (with zero excluded).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..131072
program: (define (A266112 n) (let ((parent (- n (A000005 n)))) (let loop ((k (- n 1))) (cond ((<= k parent) 1) ((= (- k (A000005 k)) parent) 0) (else (loop (- k 1)))))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 21 2015
